post.text: "Mi nombre es Mae Wiggins. Me negaron un apartamento en los edificios de Trump por mi color de piel".

comment.author: Alex
comment.text: These vermin should be rounded up the second they step out into the light. Disgusting. http://hotair.com/archives/2016/10/25/theyre-illegal-immigrants-go-door-door-behalf-hillary/

replies.author: Kyleigh Dawn
replies.text: Have you been watching videos of what refugees do to children girls and boys and women? You might want to read European news and videos And see what's happening since they've opened their borders!! Hillary wants to open borders All of Your borders to Hundreds of Thousands of them here in our United States of America Guess who's paying for their housing, food, education, businesses, and welfare checks? When some of them have more than 3 wives and 20 children to feed and house That's thousands going to them a month!! And YOU AMERICANS are paying for it out of your pocket Whether You're democrats or republican, green , whatever Thousands will replace you Taking your jobs! You'll be paying for their comfort While you're struggling to feed your own family ! And If you are on welfare, disability, social security, Medicare, Medicare.. Poof It's Gone!!! When were Americans EVER MADE to have insurance? And FINED or go to jail if you didn't pay up! All THEY want Is all of your money!!

replies.author: Jaclyn
replies.text: Sorry to break it to all you paid Trump spammers, but Trump is gonna lose.... lose big.... huuuuuuuge!!!! Lol ... Hillary Clinton will be our next President, get used to it weirdos!!! #NeverTrump You're wasting your time here,WE THE PEOPLE will not be bullied into voting for #AmarisaldDouche! WE THE PEOPLE will retire the train come November 8th!
